ai_description: Compact hexagonal dumbbells with a smooth neoprene-coated surface in bright pink, purple, and teal tones. Each end cap is flat with the KAKSS logo and weight clearly printed in white. The coated cast-iron heads and matching handle create a solid, non-slip grip for home workouts.
target_audience: People setting up a home gym, fitness enthusiasts, and individuals attending or leading workout and fitness classes.
product_name: KAKSS Neoprene Workout Fixed Weight Dumbbell (Proudly Made In India) (20-Pound Total - 3 Pairs (2Lb,3Lb,5Lb) With Stand)
